title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When changing the text in a StyledText widget with word wrap enabled, the widget is redrawing inefficiently.
OB: The StyledText widget is redrawing the entire visible area of text even when only a small portion of the text is changed.
EB: The StyledText widget should only redraw the portion of text that has been changed.
SR: To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps: 1. Add the following line to the `StyledText.performPaint` method: `System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);`
